original_text: From the days of John the Baptist until now, the kingdom of heaven has been subjected to violence, and violent people have been raiding it.
korean_text: 세례 요한의 때부터 지금까지 천국은 침노를 당하나니 침노하는 자는 빼앗느니라

sentences.original_text: From the days of John the Baptist until now,
the kingdom of heaven has been subjected to violence,
and violent people have been raiding it.
